review: This 72 year old grandmom is not from the dark ages but, not a techie, was a bit nervous about hooking up the Fire TV Stick. I need not have feared. Thank you Amazon, it was easy. During a visit with our 16 year old grandson, I hooked it up; registered my WiFi password; Peter zoomed through the movies (showing me how easy it is); and we watched Steve Martin! My only problem was my Comcast WiFi signal kept going weak; stopping the movie for a couple minutes each time. Annoying but we managed to laugh and get snacks during the interruptions. I will have to deal with Comcast over this issue but as far as the Fire TV Stick, we are sure to watch a lot of movies.
